title: Diamond Dazzle Bangles - Traditional Kadas
features: Classic bangle design featuring individually prong-set, brilliant-cut diamonds along the entire circumference. The 'Kalika' pattern (bud design) between the diamonds adds a traditional touch. The gold setting is meticulously crafted with a smooth, comfortable finish for all-day wear. Features secure lock for safety.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the brilliant white sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion. Perfect to be worn during celebrations like Seemantham
Half-Saree function or even a casual gathering to elevate your style.
description: These bangles combine timeless elegance with modern sparkle. The high-quality diamonds and 22K gold construction ensure durability and lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making this a truly eye-catching piece. A perfect blend of tradition and modern design.
